title: Linux bunzip2 Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the Linux bunzip2 command to extract and decompress compressed files. Explore practical examples and understand the command's syntax and purpose.

meta.title: Linux bunzip2 Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the Linux bunzip2 command to extract and decompress compressed files. Explore practical examples and understand the command's syntax and purpose.
meta.keywords: Linux, bunzip2, compression, decompression, file extraction, command line, practical examples

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the bunzip2 Command

verify.name: Verify the bunzip2 command usage
verify.hint: Make sure you can display the usage information for the `bunzip2` command using the `--help` option.

verify.hint: Make sure the `example.txt` file is created and contains the expected content.

steps.title: Decompress Multiple Files with bunzip2 Command

verify.name: Verify the decompressed files
verify.hint: Make sure the three decompressed files (`file1.txt`, `file2.txt`, and `file3.txt`) are created and contain the expected content.
